entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 01:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Rain beginning late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
